Lyric:
[by:Hu_uuu]
[ti:A Place Called you]
[ar:Emma Stevens]
[al:Enchaned]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:26.03]Long ago and far away
[00:30.16]You took me to a place
[00:32.07]I can’t forget
[00:35.40]If You’re my knight in shining armour
[00:40.29]Guess you just don’t realise it yet
[00:44.82]I been cooped up in a tower
[00:47.67]For hours and hours
[00:50.56]But the wrong guys all try to rescue me
[00:55.14]Why kiss another frog
[00:57.48]You’re the only one I want
[01:00.51]It’s obvious,
[01:01.92]Why can’t you see?
[01:04.80]Wontcha take me to the place we used to meet
[01:10.38]It’s sunny and funny
[01:12.91]And quirky and oh oh oh
[01:15.60]A little piece of heaven
[01:18.14]And I so wanna go
[01:20.69]I know my happy ending
[01:23.08]But you don’t have a clue
[01:25.66]Cause where I wanna be is a place
[01:29.79]A place called you
[01:41.57]Long ago and far away
[01:45.86]In a land of make believe
[01:50.89]I saw a perfect happy ending
[01:55.89]So come on back and set me free
[02:00.48]I been cooped up in a tower
[02:03.09]For hours and hours
[02:06.03]The wrong guys all try to rescue me
[02:10.42]Why kiss another frog

[02:35.92]I know my happy ending
[02:38.26]But you don’t have a clue
[02:41.05]Cause where I wanna be is a place
[02:45.29]A place called you
[02:46.48]Take me to the place where the stars come out
[02:48.27]Just you and me it’s what it’s all about
[02:51.11]Take me to a place where we used go
[02:53.40]Where you know let me love so. Oh oh oh
[02:56.30]Take me to the place where the stars come out
[02:58.29]Just you and me it’s what it’s all about
[03:01.17]Take me to a place where we used go
[03:03.11]Where you know let me love so. Oh oh oh

[03:21.36]Cause where I wanna be is a place
[03:25.69]A place called~  you
[03:28.28]It’s sunny and funny
[03:30.58]And quirky and oh oh oh
[03:33.46]A little piece of heaven
[03:35.70]And I so wanna go
[03:38.54]I know my happy ending
